title: Lassen Volcanic National Park: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials Discover Lassen Volcanic National Park from your classroom. View lesson plans and cirricula developed by park education staff. All Curriculum Materials     Field Trips Bring your students to Lassen Volcanic National Park. Find resources for planning a classroom trip including ranger-led program offerings, fee waiver forms, and more. All Field Trips     Materials to Loan Learn what materials you can borrow from the park for your class. All Materials to Loan
